ingredients: 1 (15-ounce / 425 g) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed
1 to 2 garlic cloves, minced or crushed
1/4 cup (60 ml) water or aquafaba (the liquid from the chickpea can)
1/3 cup (80 ml) extra virgin olive oil
Optional toppings: whole chickpeas, paprika, fresh parsley, and a drizzle of olive oil
